description: Code formatting and quality hooks for development

hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$file_path" && -f "$file_path" ]]; then case "$file_path" in *.py|*.js|*.jsx|*.ts|*.tsx) if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i '' 's/^[[:space:]]*$//g' "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; else sed -i 's/^[[:space:]]*$//g' "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi ;; esac; fi
